title: Pro PowerShell for Amazon Web Services [PDF]
description:
Pro PowerShell for Amazon Web Services: DevOps for the AWS Cloud

English | ISBN: 1430264519 | 2014 | 316 pages | PDF | 8 MB 

Pro PowerShell for Amazon Web Services is written specifically for Windows professionals who already know PowerShell and want to learn to host Windows workloads in the Amazon Elastic Cloud Compute EC2 cloud service. 

The cloud offers information technology workers significant cost savings and agility unimaginable even just a few years ago. 

Tasks that traditionally took weeks of work, costing thousands of dollars, can be completed in minutes for a fraction of a penny.
